title: Flat Analog Watch Face

descriptionHTML:
Flat Analog Watch Face is truly one of a kind. This watch face highlights a flat and simple design that will beautifully display on your watch. The watch face includes two flat themes that will give you the ability mix and match to fit your style. Whether you want a sleek black design or a classic white theme we’ve got you covered. This watch face was built from scratch to support both round and square screens intuitively.

Flat Analog Watch Face Sport is here!
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.css.flatanalogwatchfacesport

Features include:
- Sweeping second hand
- Minimal mode

Supports both square and round screens

Supported Devices include:
- Huawei Watch
- Fossil Q Founder
- LG Watch Urbane
- LG G Watch R
- Moto 360 (2nd Generation 42mm)
- Moto 360 (2ng Generation 46mm)
- ASUS Zenwatch
- Sony Smartwatch 3
recentChanges: We added the Navy color theme and added support for the Hindi and Korean languages. We also fixed minor bugs and made improvements.
